meanings.definition: Lahals (noun): a type of plant commonly found in tropical regions.

meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of lahals in the jungle.

meanings.sent5: The fragrance of lahals filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Lahals (verb): to move quickly and energetically.
